Description:
Views, position and indulgent luxury
Proudly occupying an elevated 993 sq m approx. allotment at the top of a boutique, family-oriented court, this 4 bedroom home will impress the most discerning buyer with its unsurpassed views, multiple living areas and heated in-ground pool.
At the front of the home, a generous study and formal lounge and dining room have quality carpets and enjoy north-oriented views over Croydon Hills, extending to Kinglake and the Macedon Ranges.
Ideal for everyday living and entertaining, the family room, meals area and kitchen are central to the home, providing access to a sandstone-paved alfresco area, covered by a Red Gum pitched-roof pergola with lighting. The elegant kitchen features an island bench, glass splashback, an LG dishwasher and a Westinghouse gas cooktop and wall oven. The family room extends to a rumpus/games room which overlooks the pool.
The master bedroom is positioned for privacy, boasting a deep walk-in wardrobe and a stylish ensuite with twin basins and a generous shower. Another 3 carpeted bedrooms with built-in wardrobes share a powder room and light-filled family bathroom, complementing a large laundry with ample storage.
Fully landscaped with drought tolerant plants, the backyard is a peaceful haven, featuring an elevated children's play area with even greater views and the solar heated, in-ground pool compatible with both saltwater and standard chlorination.
As you would expect from a property of this calibre, further luxuries include: polished timber floors, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, a security alarm, surround sound wiring, ducted vacuum and sunblinds. Appealing to tradespeople and car enthusiasts, a deep double garage sits below the house and features an automatic door, workshop and access to cellaring and vast storage, currently used as a gym.
The adjacent Council land accesses a bush reserve and this family-oriented court enjoys elite nearby schools including Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar and Rudolf Steiner School. It's also close to a selection of primary schools, recreation and flora reserves, with handy local shopping at Maroondah Village, McAdam Square, Croydon Central and Chirnside Park Shopping Centres.

- 3 living rooms

- Heated in-ground pool
- Huge garage with storage
- Nearby private schools
